verses.verse: Rejoice <WH7442> in the LORD <WH3068>, O ye righteous <WH6662>: for praise <WH8416> is comely <WH5000> for the upright <WH3477>.
Praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> with harp <WH3658>: sing <WH2167> unto him with the psaltery <WH5035> and an instrument of ten strings <WH6218>.
Sing <WH7891> unto him a new <WH2319> song <WH7892>; play <WH5059> skilfully <WH3190> with a loud noise <WH8643>.
For the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> is right <WH3477>; and all his works <WH4639> are done in truth <WH530>.
He loveth <WH157> righteousness <WH6666> and judgment <WH4941>: the earth <WH776> is full <WH4390> of the goodness <WH2617> of the LORD <WH3068>. goodness: or, mercy
By the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> were the heavens <WH8064> made <WH6213>; and all the host <WH6635> of them by the breath <WH7307> of his mouth <WH6310>.
He gathereth <WH3664> the waters <WH4325> of the sea <WH3220> together as an heap <WH5067>: he layeth up <WH5414> the depth <WH8415> in storehouses <WH214>.
Let all the earth <WH776> fear <WH3372> the LORD <WH3068>: let all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the world <WH8398> stand in awe <WH1481> of him.
For he spake <WH559>, and it was done; he commanded <WH6680>, and it stood fast <WH5975>.

The LORD <WH3068> bringeth <WH6331> the counsel <WH6098> of the heathen <WH1471> to nought <WH6331>: he maketh <WH5106> the devices <WH4284> of the people <WH5971> of none effect <WH5106>. bringeth: Heb. maketh frustrate

The counsel <WH6098> of the LORD <WH3068> standeth <WH5975> for ever <WH5769>, the thoughts <WH4284> of his heart <WH3820> to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>. to all: Heb. to generation and generation
Blessed <WH835> is the nation <WH1471> whose God <WH430> is the LORD <WH3068>; and the people <WH5971> whom he hath chosen <WH977> for his own inheritance <WH5159>.
The LORD <WH3068> looketh <WH5027> from heaven <WH8064>; he beholdeth <WH7200> all the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
From the place <WH4349> of his habitation <WH3427> he looketh <WH7688> upon all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the earth <WH776>.
He fashioneth <WH3335> their hearts <WH3820> alike <WH3162>; he considereth <WH995> all their works <WH4639>.
There is no king <WH4428> saved <WH3467> by the multitude <WH7230> of an host <WH2428>: a mighty man <WH1368> is not delivered <WH5337> by much <WH7230> strength <WH3581>.
An horse <WH5483> is a vain thing <WH8267> for safety <WH8668>: neither shall he deliver <WH4422> any by his great <WH7230> strength <WH2428>.
Behold, the eye <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068> is upon them that fear <WH3373> him, upon them that hope <WH3176> in his mercy <WH2617>;
To deliver <WH5337> their soul <WH5315> from death <WH4194>, and to keep them alive <WH2421> in famine <WH7458>.
Our soul <WH5315> waiteth <WH2442> for the LORD <WH3068>: he is our help <WH5828> and our shield <WH4043>.
For our heart <WH3820> shall rejoice <WH8055> in him, because we have trusted <WH982> in his holy <WH6944> name <WH8034>.
Let thy mercy <WH2617>, O LORD <WH3068>, be upon us, according as we hope <WH3176> in thee.
